reviewText:
Caballero is a ambitious distribution company
But, there digital releases =DVD's are a bit weak
The PQ is usually VHS-Rip quality I'm sure there are Laserdisc that look better then some of Caballero Classic releases
This was released on dvd on  05/2006 still in Print
It's actually still easy to get for under $5.00
If you are a classic adult film fan
It's a must have all around but, don't expect a HQ Remastering in any way
with a top notch cast:  Debra Lynn, Ginger Lynn, Harry Reems, Janey Robbins, Kelli Richards, Marc Wallice, Susan Hart, Tony Elay

This is all Ginger, all the time. In pounding back-yard sequences, feverish lesbian scenes and torrid interracial pairings, porn legend Ginger Lynn shines like an erotic beacon throughout this comprehensive `best-of' volume. Janey Robbins and Ginger come together like two horny she wolves and reach almost simultaneous climaxes after working each other over with a stirring combination of finesse and pure carnal greed. Then Ginger hooks up with Harry Reems for some plain ol' clean screwing. Then it's more of the same with big black Tony Elay and lily-white Debra Lynn in a ravenous three way. With a front-to-back collection of wild-eyed, Ginger-style escapades, this is a must have for Ms. Lynn's fans as well as those who would are looking for their first taste of this blue-movie legend.

If you are a huge Ginger Lynn fan it's a must
The film without a doubt deserves a proper remastering  7.5/10
